channel.title: Kentucky Derby
channel.description:
Just watched Kentucky derby, My dad placed 70$ on about 8 horses. I placed 2$ on May i have Another, and he wins it.
If anybody wants to bet on the next race and needs a decision, PM Me. Im the master.

item.title: Kentucky Derby
item.dc:creator: @_N_eon (N)eon
item.description:
@_N_eon wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:3, topic:441456”]I won an trifecta for it which wasn’t that bad. 1.5K payout. I had wins on another also but don’t remember the exact payout. I think it was like 30 for 2?
My dad was one off on the super.

Its not really that much of an accomplishment though as I’ve been betting on horses/greyhounds for a while.[/quote]

Its an accomplishment for me, as i do not Read up on the horses, Jockey, and the owner.

Read full topic

item.title: Kentucky Derby
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

I live in Louisville, Kentucky. I had a hat drawn bet on Laison (53-1) He placed 6th. Only 1$ entry so I did not lose out, but I just thought it to be my luck to draw the 53-1

Read full topic

item.title: Kentucky Derby
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

I have a miniature dachshund, I usually take him to races. Hes EXTREMELY strong, fast and agile for his breed. When I take him to races, I bet on him. Mainly because hes a winner.

Read full topic

item.title: Kentucky Derby
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I won an trifecta for it which wasn’t that bad. 1.5K payout. I had wins on another also but don’t remember the exact payout. I think it was like 30 for 2?
My dad was one off on the super.

Its not really that much of an accomplishment though as I’ve been betting on horses/greyhounds for a while.

Read full topic
